404:1: atha padmottamastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho avalokiteśvarametadavocat–dadasva me kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīm,
404:4: athe avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāmanuprayacchati–
404:11: yasmin kāle iyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā anupradattā,
404:16: atha padmottamena tathāgatena bhujaṃgasadṛśaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya avalokiteśvarasya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāram,
404:18: tena gṛhītvā tasya padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyopanāmitam|
404:19: atha padmottamastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ gṛhītvā yena patrottamo nāma lokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
404:20: evaṃ kulaputra mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva sakāśācchrutam ||
404:21: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan labheyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyā rājñīṃ prāptayogasya ?
404:22: yathā hi bhagavannamṛtasya labdhāsvādāstṛptiṃ na labhante,
404:23: evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāśrutamātreṇa tṛptiṃ na labhāma |
404:24: puṇyavantaste sattvā ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti śṛṇvanti cintayanti adhyāśayena dhārayanti ||
404:28: paramāṇurajopamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayet,
404:33: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japet,
404:43: dhyānālaṃkāro nāma samādhiḥ dharmarathābhirūḍho nāma samādhiḥ,
